dt: {bc}a fixed curve with which a generatrix maintains a given relationship in generating a geometric figure
{bc}a straight line the distance to which from any point of a conic section is in fixed ratio to the distance from the same point to a focus

et: Medieval Latin, feminine of Late Latin {it}director{/it}, from Latin {it}dirigere{/it}
shortdef: a fixed curve with which a generatrix maintains a given relationship in generating a geometric figure; specifically : a straight line the distance to which from any point of a conic section is in fixed ratio to the distance from the same point to a focus
